data.message: Created V2 Premium Bold homepage mockup for Epiphiny Flow diaspora investment platform: Successfully designed complete homepage with: mesh gradient hero, glassmorphic portfolio card ($847,230), logo strip, stats section (72px numbers), bento grid features, testimonials with avatars, CTA with ambient glows, footer. User approved direction and asked about code implementation.
